sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import "./stockDetail.css"; import { ModalBuying, ModalSelling } from "../../items"; import axios from "axios"; const StockDetail = () => { const [buyOpen, setBuyOpen] = useState(false); const [sellOpen, setSellOpen] = useState(false); const [nowStock, setNowStock] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { axios .get(`http://localhost:8080/stocks/{symbol}`) .then((response) => { console.log(`StockDetail useEffect then`); setNowStock(response.data); }) .catch((error) => { console.log(`StockDetail useEffect catch`); throw error; }); }, []); return ( <>
{nowStock.stockName} {nowStock.symbol} {nowStock.date}
{nowStock.nowPrice}
{nowStock.dod}
전일 {nowStock.close}
시가 {nowStock.open} 		고가 {nowStock.high}
저가 {nowStock.low} 		거래량 {nowStock.volume}
거래대금 34,291
setBuyOpen(false)} /> setSellOpen(false)} /> ); }; export default StockDetail;
